certificate.title: Certificate from Enlight
certificate.description: Confirms that you have completed the course and will be an added value when applying for a job.

0.name: Ruslan Ismailov, Uzbekistan, Tashkent
0.text: Everything is great, especially the curator's work. I liked the timely review of practical tasks and the Telegram chat group where you can ask any question and get an answer at any time.

1.name: Muhammadjon Nabiev, Uzbekistan, Fergana
1.text: Everything is clear and explained concisely. Before starting, I thought it was impossible to learn the profession, but Skillbox proved otherwise. Thank you very much!

2.name: Aliya Rakhimova, Uzbekistan, Samarkand
2.text: Very cool approach! Lots of practice, interesting tasks, and excellent mentors.

3.name: Sherzod Karimov, Uzbekistan, Andijan
3.text: The material is presented in a simple and accessible way. I learned a lot in a short time.
